org.apache.ambari.server.api.services

Class AmbariMetaInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.api.services.AmbariMetaInfo

  • public class AmbariMetaInfo
extends Object
    ServiceInfo responsible getting information about cluster.

      • getAlertDefinitions

        public Set<AlertDefinition> getAlertDefinitions(String stackName,
                                                String stackVersion,
                                                String serviceName)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets the alert definitions for the specified stack and service.
        Parameters:
        stackName - the stack name
        stackVersion - the stack version
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the alert definitions for a stack or an empty list if none (never null).
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • getAlertDefinitions

        public Set<AlertDefinition> getAlertDefinitions(ServiceInfo service)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets the alert definitions for the specified stack and service.
        Parameters:
        service - the service name
        Returns:
        the alert definitions for a stack or an empty list if none (never null).
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • reconcileAlertDefinitions

        public void reconcileAlertDefinitions(Clusters clusters,
                                      boolean updateScriptPaths)
                               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Compares the alert definitions defined on the stack with those in the database and merges any new or updated definitions. This method will first determine the services that are installed on each cluster to prevent alert definitions from undeployed services from being shown.

        This method will also detect "agent" alert definitions, which are definitions that should be run on agent hosts but are not associated with a service.

        Parameters:
        clusters - all clusters
        updateScriptPaths - whether existing script-based alerts should be updated with possibly new paths from the stack definition
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • reconcileAlertDefinitions

        public void reconcileAlertDefinitions(Cluster cluster,
                                      boolean updateScriptPaths)
                               throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Compares the alert definitions defined on the stack with those in the database and merges any new or updated definitions. This method will first determine the services that are installed on each cluster to prevent alert definitions from undeployed services from being shown.

        This method will also detect "agent" alert definitions, which are definitions that should be run on agent hosts but are not associated with a service.

        Parameters:
        cluster - cluster
        updateScriptPaths - whether existing script-based alerts should be updated with possibly new paths from the stack definition
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • getUpgradePacks

        public Map<String,UpgradePack> getUpgradePacks(String stackName,
                                               String stackVersion)
        Get all upgrade packs available for a stack.
        Parameters:
        stackName - the stack name
        stackVersion - the stack version
        Returns:
        a map of upgrade packs, keyed by the name of the upgrade pack

      • getConfigUpgradePack

        public ConfigUpgradePack getConfigUpgradePack(String stackName,
                                              String stackVersion)
        Get all upgrade config pack if it is available for a stack.
        Parameters:
        stackName - the stack name
        stackVersion - the stack version
        Returns:
        config upgrade pack for stack or null if it is not defined for stack

      • getKerberosDescriptor

        public KerberosDescriptor getKerberosDescriptor(String stackName,
                                                String stackVersion,
                                                boolean includePreconfigureData)
                                         throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets the fully compiled Kerberos descriptor for the relevant stack and version.

        All of the kerberos.json files from the specified stack (and version) are read, parsed and complied into a complete Kerberos descriptor hierarchy.

        Parameters:
        stackName - a String declaring the stack name
        stackVersion - a String declaring the stack version
        includePreconfigureData - a Boolean value indicating whether to include the pre-configuration data (true), or not (false)
        Returns:
        a new complete KerberosDescriptor, or null if no Kerberos descriptor information is available
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs reading or parsing the stack's kerberos.json files

      • getCommonKerberosDescriptorFileLocation

        protected String getCommonKerberosDescriptorFileLocation()
        Gets the path to the common Kerberos descriptor file
        Returns:
        a String containing the path to the common Kerberos descriptor file

      • getKerberosDescriptor

        public KerberosServiceDescriptor[] getKerberosDescriptor(ServiceInfo serviceInfo)
                                                  throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Gets the requested service-level Kerberos descriptor(s)

        An array of descriptors are returned since the kerberos.json in a service directory may contain descriptor details for one or more services.

        Parameters:
        serviceInfo - a ServiceInfo declaring the stack name, version, a service (directory) name details
        Returns:
        an array of KerberosServiceDescriptors, or null if the relevant service (directory) does not contain Kerberos descriptor details
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - if an error occurs reading or parsing the service's kerberos.json files

      • getAmbariServerProperties

        public Map<String,String> getAmbariServerProperties()

      • getVersionDefinition

        public VersionDefinitionXml getVersionDefinition(String versionDefinitionId)
        Parameters:
        versionDefinitionId - the version definition id
        Returns:
        the definition, or null if not found

      • getVersionDefinitions

        public Map<String,VersionDefinitionXml> getVersionDefinitions()
        Returns:
        the version definitions found for stacks

      • getCommonWidgetsDescriptorFile

        public File getCommonWidgetsDescriptorFile()

      • removeMpack

        public void removeMpack(MpackEntity mpackEntity,
                        StackEntity stackEntity)
                 throws IOException
        Remove Mpack from the mpackMap and stackMap which is used to power the Mpack and Stack APIs. Stack should be removed from stackMap only if it points to the mpack that is being removed.
        Parameters:
        mpackEntity -
        stackEntity -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getMpacks

        public Collection<Mpack> getMpacks()

      • getMpack

        public Mpack getMpack(Long mpackId)
        Fetch a particular mpack based on mpackid
        Returns:
        a single mpack
